mapper.sql: uuid, orgin, fol_url, idno, doctor_id, doctor_name, doctor_sign_url, team_id, org_id, org_name, birthday, name, identifier, follow_up_style, follow_up_date, symptom, symptom_other, high_pressure, low_pressure, height, weight, weight_exp, bmi, bmi_exp, heart_rate, sign_other, count_cigarette, count_cigarette_exp, count_wine, count_wine_exp, exercise, frequency, exercise_exp, frequency_exp, salt_situation, salt_situation_exp, psy_recovery, treatment_compliance, other_check, medication_compliance, adverce_reaction_code, adverce_reaction_detail, classify_follow_up, management_next_step, transfer_reason, transfer_org, contract_name, contract_tel, transfer_result, next_date, jumin_name, jumin_name_url, remarks, lost_date, lost_reason, death_date, death_reason, gw_sf_id, gw_sf_dah, gw_da_status, gw_da_msg, gw_up_flag, gw_up_msg, gw_up_create_time, gw_up_update_time
mapper.select: select * from wd_mb_hyper_fol a where a.org_id like CONCAT("%",#{orgId},"%") and (a.gw_up_msg is null or a.gw_up_msg=''or a.gw_up_msg not like "%成功%") and a.lost_date is null and a.death_date is null and a.orgin ="APP" order by a.org_id asc,follow_up_date asc ;
select distinct a.idno,a.`name`,a.org_id,a.org_name from wd_mb_hyper_fol a where a.org_id like CONCAT("%",#{orgId},"%") and a.lost_date is null and a.death_date is null order by a.org_id asc ;

select * from wd_mb_hyper_fol where org_id like CONCAT("%",#{orgId},"%") and (gw_up_msg ='' or gw_up_msg is null or gw_up_msg not like '%成功%') and (gw_up_msg ='' or gw_up_msg is null or gw_up_msg not like '%管理卡%') and lost_date is null and death_date is NULL and orgin = 'APP' ORDER BY org_id asc,idno ASC,follow_up_date DESC
select * from wd_mb_hyper_fol where org_id like CONCAT("%",#{orgId},"%") and orgin = 'TJ' order by org_id asc,idno asc,follow_up_date asc;

select tmp.org_id ,tmp.idno ,tmp.follow_up_date,tmp.next_date from (select b.uuid,b.orgin,b.org_id,b.follow_up_date,b.gw_up_update_time,b.transfer_reason,a.xm,a.tel,a.address,b.idno,b.next_date,TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,b.follow_up_date,b.next_date) from wd_ehr a LEFT JOIN wd_mb_hyper_fol b on (a.sfz = b.idno and a.is_gxy ='1' and a.gxy_enable ='1' and a.org_id = b.org_id and b.death_date is null and b.lost_date is null) where a.type like '%高血压%' and (b.follow_up_date = (select max(c.follow_up_date) from wd_mb_hyper_fol c where c.org_id = b.org_id and c.idno = b.idno and c.death_date is null and c.lost_date is null) and a.org_id like '%37132601%' ) and a.is_gxy ='1' and a.gxy_enable ='1' ORDER BY a.org_id asc,a.sfz asc,b.follow_up_date ASC) as tmp LEFT JOIN common_organization t on t.org_id = tmp.org_id ORDER BY t.org_id ASC;

update wd_mb_hyper_fol
orgin = #{orgin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fol_url = #{folUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idno = #{idno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doctor_name = #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doctor_sign_url = #{doctorSignUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
team_id = #{teamId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_name = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
identifier = #{identifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
follow_up_style = #{followUpStyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
follow_up_date = #{followUpDate,jdbcType=DATE},
symptom = #{symptom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
symptom_other = #{symptomOther,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
high_pressure = #{highPressure,jdbcType=INTEGER},
low_pressure = #{lowPressure,jdbcType=INTEGER},
height = #{height,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
weight_exp = #{weightExp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
bmi = #{bmi,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
bmi_exp = #{bmiExp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
heart_rate = #{heartRate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sign_other = #{signOther,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
count_cigarette = #{countCigarette,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
count_cigarette_exp = #{countCigaretteExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
count_wine = #{countWine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
count_wine_exp = #{countWineExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exercise = #{exercise,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
frequency = #{frequency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exercise_exp = #{exerciseExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
frequency_exp = #{frequencyExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salt_situation = #{saltSituation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salt_situation_exp = #{saltSituationExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
psy_recovery = #{psyRecovery,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
treatment_compliance = #{treatmentCompliance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
other_check = #{otherCheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medication_compliance = #{medicationCompliance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
adverce_reaction_code = #{adverceReactionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
adverce_reaction_detail = #{adverceReactionDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
classify_follow_up = #{classifyFollowUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
management_next_step = #{managementNextStep,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transfer_reason = #{transferReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transfer_org = #{transferOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contract_name = #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contract_tel = #{contractTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transfer_result = #{transferResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
next_date = #{nextDate,jdbcType=DATE},
jumin_name = #{juminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jumin_name_url = #{juminNameUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lost_date = #{lostDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lost_reason = #{lostReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
death_date = #{deathDate,jdbcType=DATE},
death_reason = #{deathReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gw_sf_id = #{gwSfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gw_sf_dah = #{gwSfDah,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gw_da_status = #{gwDaStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gw_da_msg = #{gwDaMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gw_up_flag = #{gwUpFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gw_up_msg = #{gwUpMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gw_up_create_time = #{gwUpCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gw_up_update_time = #{gwUpUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update wd_mb_hyper_fol set orgin = #{orgin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fol_url = #{folUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idno = #{idno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_name =
